3. enable two-factor authentication: this adds an extra layer of security to your accounts and ensures that even if someone has your password, they still cannot access your account without additional verification.

4. be mindful of what you download and install: only download apps from trusted sources and avoid installing any apps that seem suspicious or ask for too many permissions.

5. manage your privacy settings: check the privacy settings on each social media platform to ensure that only those who you want can see your posts and information.
